Controller

Class RoomController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.RoomController

  • public class RoomController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the controller for using the Room class
    Since:
    2018-04-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    TeamFour

      • updateRoom

        public static int updateRoom(java.lang.String roomNumber,
                             java.lang.String catagory,
                             java.lang.String value)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Update the properties of the room
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - RoomNumber of the room
        catagory - Category of the room
        value - The new value that will replace the existing value
        Returns:
        If it is successfully updated, this method will return 1 else it will return 0
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception

      • checkRoomAvailability

        public static boolean checkRoomAvailability(java.lang.String roomNumber)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the room with given RoomNumber is available
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - RoomNumber of the room
        Returns:
        This method returns true if room is available, else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception

      • checkRoomExist

        public static boolean checkRoomExist(java.lang.String roomNumber)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the room with given RoomNumber exists inside the room.txt
        Parameters:
        roomNumber - RoomNumber of the room
        Returns:
        This method returns true if room exists, else false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception

      • printAvailableRoom

        public static void printAvailableRoom(java.lang.Boolean ByRoomType)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Prints all the vacant rooms based on the type of the room or prints all the rooms according to their room status
        Parameters:
        ByRoomType - if true, this makes methods to print rooms by type of the room. Else, this makes methods to print rooms by room status
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throw input/output exception
